mahawanshaya palamu kotase wadi warnanawata lakwa sitinne anuradhapuraye wisu dutugamunu raju ya chulawanshaye wiraya mahaparakramabahu rajuya kirthi shri nishshankamalla raju gana chulawansha kathuwaraya wenkara aththe gatha 8ki eheth sathmahal prasadaya ,watadageya ,rankothwehera,wishala sellipi sankyawak pihituwima nisa wadi prasiddhiyak labu me raju hithamathama yatapath kirima sambandhawa wishala sakayak pawathi .ihathin dakwu paridi parakrama samudraya kumakda yanna pilibandawa wiwidha matha athi wi thibena bawa peni yannaki ese nam meya hadunaganne keseda yanna pilibandawa athi sakshi meseya chulawanshaye sandahan aakarayata parakrama samudrayen nikmunawu alawal 4k athulu nuwarata aasannayen galagiya bawa dakwayi ee sadahana anuwa polonnaruwa nagaraya aasannayen eya pihituwa thibu bawata sakayak natha esema eya "kandu atharehi maha badimen kara gangawa awura jala prawahaya aakasha gangawa nam maha alakin me wawata jalaya gena ena ladi " yana kiyamanak we hokart ha kodrintan yana widwathunge adahas anuwa me kara gangawa yanu ambaan gangayi aakasha gangawa yanu angamadilla alayi me anuwa ambaan ganga angamadilla yana sthanayedi amunak bada ee jalaya angamadilla ala osse parakrama samudrayata genawith thibe .
